name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a results-driven Software Development Engineer III with 8 years of experience, I excel in TypeScript and have a strong command of **WebGL**, **WebGPU**, **Web Workers**, and **WebAssembly**, focusing on performance optimization and graphics programming. My technical expertise includes algorithms, **OpenGL**, and building efficient applications that leverage Mobile SDKs and location technologies for seamless maps and GIS integration. 
My full-stack development background encompasses **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, along with robust proficiency in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have led the creation of enterprise-grade platforms, integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics, intelligent automation, and real-time data processing. 
Additionally, my deep cloud experience includes working with **Azure** and **AWS**, reinforced by a strong foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation. I prioritize developing secure applications that meet compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My hands-on experience also extends to developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
